description: Sol’Kesh, created by Terry Maranda, is a comprehensive tabletop RPG project that brings a speculative evolution-themed world to life. Divided into three main components—a Bestiary, an Art and Story Journal, and a set of 3D-printable miniatures—Sol’Kesh offers a unique exploration of what life might look like on a future Earth shaped by evolution long after...
title: Sol’Kesh: A Speculative Evolution Bestiary, Art Journal & Miniatures for 5e – Now on Kickstarter

description: Draw 20 introduces a card-based alternative to the traditional D20 die, designed to work with any D20 system, including D&D 5e, for skill checks, attacks, saving throws, and more. Instead of rolling, players shuffle the deck and draw a card, each numbered from 1 to 20. Every card features unique artwork to visually capture the...
title: Draw 20: A Card-Based D20 Alternative for RPGs – On Kickstarter Now

description: Secret Passages #1 is a new quarterly zine diving into the roleplaying and wargaming culture that shaped a generation of fans in the 1980s and 1990s. Featuring 100 pages of interviews, original artwork, and in-depth essays, this A5 magazine offers a detailed look at the games, figures, and media that became icons for those who...
title: Secret Passages #1: A New Zine Celebrating the RPGs and Wargames That Shaped a Generation

description: Rookie Jet Studio has launched Espers, a new tabletop roleplaying game that combines traditional RPG mechanics with a unique deckbuilding element. Set in the magical and complex world of Myriil, Espers invites players to step into the role of powerful magic users known as Espers, who are deeply connected to ancient forces. These individuals, through...
title: Espers: A New TTRPG with Deckbuilding Mechanics Hits Kickstarter
